text: Ni$ Issawel awen Oebbi tidep, di lemaahda S, mi ten tesnegrem, s tsrie iS. Armi, mi tfeclem, temnamarem f lameo, taauam mbaad ma Issken awen d ayen teemmlem. Garawen wid ib$an ddunit, garawen wid ib$an laxert. Sinna, Issebaad ikwen fellasen, iwakken a kwen Ijeooeb. Ni$ Isemmee awen. Oebbi d Bab n lfevl i lmumnin
